title: "LTX Corporate Bond Trading Moves To AWS For Better AI"
excerpt: "LTX has migrated its electronic trading platform for corporate bonds to Amazon Web Services (AWS). The company, a subsidiary of Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc., said it will use AWS to better optimize its data science processes."
